definition: lit. like a candle in the wind, or frost on the roof (idiom)/fig. (of sb's life) feeble/hanging on a thread
pinyin: feng1 zhong1 zhu2 , wa3 shang4 shuang1

definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
roof tile/abbr. for 瓦特[wa3 te4]
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
frost/white powder or cream spread over a surface/frosting/(skin) cream
